prompts: Create a fighting-type Pokemon that excels in martial arts and has a fierce appearance.
Imagine a Pokemon with a sleek blue design and a strong, agile stance, perfect for battles.
Generate a humanoid Pokemon with steel elements, showcasing its power and agility in combat.
Make a Pokemon that can harness aura energy, with a striking color palette of blue and black.
Design a Pokemon with a unique bipedal form, featuring sharp claws and a confident demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in both urban and forest environments, with a blend of blue and gray.
Give me a fighting-type Pokemon with a mixture of elegance and strength, illustrated in a dynamic pose.

semantic_attributes.combat_style: Combat specialist with a focus on physical attacks and agility.
